author: vmassol
msg: Replaced ${context.getParent().setVariable('maven.build.dest',tmp)} with the much better <j:set var="maven.build.dest" value="${tmp}" scope="parent"/>

author: vmassol
msg: The clover:report goal does not call the tests anymore. It only generates Clover reports.

author: vmassol
msg: When executing clover:on and clover:off, modify the maven.build.dest property value in the Root context of all plugins so that the value change is available in all Maven plugins.

author: vmassol
msg: Prevented the clover:on goal from failing when there are no unit tests sources available.

author: vmassol
msg: Applied MPANNOUNCEMENT-12: Fixed error message when current version is not available at xdocs/changes.xml. Thanks Felipe.
